data.subject: Decoded Poetry
data.lyric:
Watch as the world turns around
 While your blink your eyes
 Time to awaken
 Abandon trivial laws yo

data.subject: Immortal Melancholy
data.lyric:
Wander, there's no return
 Keep moving on as the paradise burns
 Leaving your trace in the sand
 Har

data.subject: Wheel Of Destiny
data.lyric:
You will get demonized
 All actions have their price
 Choose well and carefully
 We can not tolerate

data.subject: Architect Of Light
data.lyric:
Somnia cum clamoribus
 Linquite corda plena ravoris
 Videte pompam horroris
 Paries scaenae perditor

data.subject: Fight Your Demons
data.lyric:
Defy and comply
 
 We will have to take control
 Sanguinary rules will never abide
 We're at the mer

data.subject: The Solace System
data.lyric:
Razor lights on the path of progress
 To gain new insight
 Lose control, give in to your senses
 To
